org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.commons.value

Class DefaultQValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.commons.value.AbstractQValue
      • org.apache.jackrabbit.spi.commons.value.DefaultQValue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, QValue

    public class DefaultQValue
extends AbstractQValue
implements Serializable
    QValue implementation for all valid PropertyTypes except for BINARY.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
